languages.text: {n}Обратив маску к Паскалю, еретичка глумливо добавляет:{/n} "А вот ты прибыл как раз вовремя, шестеренка. Схизматикали используют твои регалии, словно маски, чтобы усмирить реактор".
{n}The woman turns her mask to Pasqal and gloats,{/n} "You have arrived just in time, little cog. The schismaticals use your regalia like a mask to subdue the reactor."
languages.original_text: {n}Обратив маску к Паскалю, еретичка глумливо добавляет:{/n} "А вот ты прибыл как раз вовремя, шестеренка. Схизматикали используют твои регалии, словно маски, чтобы усмирить реактор".

traits.locale_text: {n}The woman turns her mask to Pasqal and gloats,{/n} "You have arrived just in time, little cog. The schismaticals use your regalia like masks to subdue the reactor."

{n}The woman turns her mask to Pasqal and gloats,{/n} "You have arrived just in time, little cog. The schismaticals use your regalia like a mask to subdue the reactor."

languages.text: {n}Die Frau wendet ihre Maske Pasqal zu und amüsiert sich.{/n} "Ihr kommt gerade rechtzeitig, Zahnrädchen. Die Abtrünnigen benutzen Eure Insignien wie eine Maske, um den Reaktor zu besänftigen."
languages.original_text: {n}The woman turns her mask to Pasqal and gloats,{/n} "You have arrived just in time, little cog. The schismaticals use your regalia like a mask to subdue the reactor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Frau wendet ihre Maske Pasqal zu und amüsiert sich.{/n} "Ihr kommt gerade rechtzeitig, Zahnrädchen. Die Abtrünnigen benutzen Eure Insignien wie eine Maske, um den Reaktor zu besänftigen."

languages.text: {n}La femme tourne son masque vers Pasqal et exulte :{/n} « Vous arrivez juste à temps, petit rouage. Les schismatiques utilisent votre insigne comme un masque pour contrôler le réacteur. »
languages.original_text: {n}The woman turns her mask to Pasqal and gloats,{/n} "You have arrived just in time, little cog. The schismaticals use your regalia like a mask to subdue the reactor."

traits.locale_text: {n}La femme tourne son masque vers Pasqal et exulte :{/n} « Vous arrivez juste à temps, petit rouage. Les schismatiques utilisent votre insigne comme un masque pour contrôler le réacteur. »

languages.text: {n}女人戴着面具的脸转向了帕斯卡，得意洋洋地开了口。{/n}“你来得正是时候，小齿轮。分离者已经用你的工具制服了反应堆。”
languages.original_text: {n}The woman turns her mask to Pasqal and gloats,{/n} "You have arrived just in time, little cog. The schismaticals use your regalia like a mask to subdue the reactor."

traits.locale_text: {n}女人戴着面具的脸转向了帕斯卡，得意洋洋地开了口。{/n}“你来得正是时候，小齿轮。分离者已经用你的工具制服了反应堆。”

languages.text: {n}女はマスクをパスカルに向けてほくそ笑む。{/n}「ちょうど間に合ったようだね、小さな歯車よ。分離派はあんたの地位をリアクター制圧のための覆いのように利用するのさ」
languages.original_text: {n}The woman turns her mask to Pasqal and gloats,{/n} "You have arrived just in time, little cog. The schismaticals use your regalia like a mask to subdue the reactor."

traits.locale_text: {n}女はマスクをパスカルに向けてほくそ笑む。{/n}「ちょうど間に合ったようだね、小さな歯車よ。分離派はあんたの地位をリアクター制圧のための覆いのように利用するのさ」

languages.text: {n}La mujer gira su máscara hacia Pasqal y se regodea,{/n} «Ha llegado justo a tiempo, pequeño engranaje. Los cismáticos usan los privilegios con los que usted cuenta para ocultarse y someter al reactor».
languages.original_text: {n}The woman turns her mask to Pasqal and gloats,{/n} "You have arrived just in time, little cog. The schismaticals use your regalia like a mask to subdue the reactor."

traits.locale_text: {n}La mujer gira su máscara hacia Pasqal y se regodea,{/n} «Ha llegado justo a tiempo, pequeño engranaje. Los cismáticos usan los privilegios con los que usted cuenta para ocultarse y someter al reactor».

languages.text: {n}Kadın, alaycı bir tavırla maskesini Pasqal'a çeviriyor.{/n} "Tam vaktinde geldin küçük dişli. Bölücüler, reaktöre boyun eğdirmek için sembolünüzü maske olarak kullanıyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The woman turns her mask to Pasqal and gloats,{/n} "You have arrived just in time, little cog. The schismaticals use your regalia like a mask to subdue the reactor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kadın, maskesini Pasqal'a çevirip böbürlenmeye başlıyor.{/n} "Tam zamanında geldin küçük dişli. Bölücüler, reaktöre boyun eğdirmek için sembolünü maske olarak kullanıyor.
